author: geirm
msg: Support for symmetrization of DIRECTIVE and REFERENCE.  See the 1.20 Parser.jjt

author: geirm
msg: Symmetrized DIRECTIVE making it similar to REFERENCE by creating a PRE_DIRECTIVE state.
Through it, we easily limit the token set when trying to match a DD or PD.  Strangely, it happened to fix a few subtle bugs on my list as well...

author: geirm
msg: Test.cmp was really 'wrong'.  It was a bug I had noted, but wanted to leave the test case in test.vm.  So I had to let test.cmp be incorrect WRT the spec.  With tonights Parser.jjt fix, this can now be correct.
